solution.text:
Cost of painting outer surface area\(=\,\)Rs.\(_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(j+2)**2*l),2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Surface area \(\times\) Rate \(=_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(j+2)**2*l),2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow 2 \pi r_o^2 \times _{l}_=_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(j+2)**2*l),2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow r_o^2=\frac{_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(j+2)**2*l),2)}}_}{2 \pi \times _{l}_}=_{{(j+2)**2}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow r_o=_{{j+2}}_\,m\)
The outer radius of the dome is \(_{{j+2}}_\,m\)

content.text: find the outer radius of the dome.
